attributes.action: Continue legal requirement to wear face masks in enclosed public places
attributes.additional_details: Wearing face masks is for others not self. I do not have faith in everyone acting to protect others when significantly inconvenient to themselves.
attributes.background: Think above covers it. Continue “Current exceptions” I.e. those in force as at 5th July 2021

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Keep face covering mandatory in indoor public settings beyond 19th July 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590616
 
Keep face masks mandatory for public transport after the lifting of restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590694
